snippet.title: The Telephone - TEASER TRAILER
snippet.description:
The Telephone è un gioco horror psicologico in prima persona che ti trasporterà in un mondo governato dall'ansia. Dovrai esplorare la casa in cui sei rinchiuso e la misteriosa cittadina di Lonely Plain, cercando indizi in grado di far tornare la memoria a Roberta.

=== GAMES ===
➜ THE TELEPHONE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2488890/The_Telephone
➜ LOST ALONE ULTIMATE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2341330/Lost_Alone_Ultimate/
➜ WHO KNOCKS: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2211640/Who_Knocks
➜ LOST ALONE EP.1: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707560/Lost_Alone_EP1__Sorellina/
➜ LOST ALONE EP.2: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1851680/Lost_Alone_Ep2__Paparino/
➜ LOST ALONE EP.3: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1911600/Lost_Alone_Ep3__Nonnina/

=== SOCIAL ===
➜ INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/doesntmattergames/
➜ TWITTER: https://twitter.com/DDM_Games
➜ WEB: https://www.doesntmattergames.com
